amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that grant funding can be used to develop, implement or expand a program to ensure the security of opioids in medical facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 114-551 to provide that grant funding can be used develop, implement or expand a program to ensure the security of opioids in medical facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 225 (Roll no. 186).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 225 (Roll no. 186).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Lynch.
